ygData.subject: Re: Combat skills for mages
ygData.msgSnippet: the max for us in combat skills is 3+3*level I think, rather than 5+5*level like for the spell-related skills. Skara ... From: Jonathan Bro
ygData.messageBody:
the max for us in combat skills is 3+3*level I think, rather than 5+5*level
like for the spell-related skills.
Skara

-----Original Message-----
From: Jonathan Bro [mailto:im_mortal_1@...]
Sent: Thursday, April 29, 1999 7:24 PM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: [eqenchanters] Combat skills for mages


From: Jonathan Bro <im_mortal_1@...>

Ok, i have this big problem...I am a level 11 enchanter and my offense
and defense skills arent even at (40) yet! (the cap is 60). I fight
alot...with my staff...and still the skill just about never ever goes
up. For example the offense, defense skill went up 1 number the whole
time i was level 10.

something has to be wrong!
